GeneralInformation.School Mission: To nurture our pupils to be future-ready by providing a Total Education in RVPS
GeneralInformation.School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Our vision "Inspiring Learners, Edifying Leaders" commits every RVian to work towards striving for the best outcomes for themselves and people around them. As Inspiring Learners, RVians have the passion for continuous learning, seek better ways of doing things and become committed members of the school as a learning organization. As Edifying Leaders, RVians have the confidence and leadership qualities to inspire, enrich and nurture the lives of others. We are committed to imbue our staff and pupils with this spirit of inspiring and edifying for us to contribute to the progress of our school and nation.  Our Philosophy 1.We believe that every child wants to and can learn, develop and lead. 2.We believe that education is never just about knowledge and skills. Importantly, it should also be about character and values. 3.We believe education must nurture creativity and curiosity in all children. 4.We believe education must empower all children to be critical in their thinking. 5.We believe that learning takes place in safe and caring environment, & when children construct knowledge actively and collaboratively.  Our Core Values 1.Serve with Respect -We value people, reaching out to build strong & trusting relationships. 2.Lead with Integrity -We demonstrate honesty & moral courage, being upright & trustworthy. 3.Live with Compassion -We seek to understand & care, extending our hands to others in need. 4.Learn with Excellence -We inspire learning, seek continuous improvement & bring out the best in everyone.  Our Motto Strive for the Best  Our Culture RVPS is committed to building a school culture of Excellence through Joy in our work & Synergy amongst our staff. 1. Excellence -We pursue excellence in empowering staff capacity & enhancing student learning & achievements. 2. Joy -We experience joy as we inspire learning in our students & edify school colleagues. 3. Synergy -We enhance staff synergy with respect, integrity & compassion so as to contribute to excellence.

School Distinctive Programmes.Community Service & Student Leadership: Enhancing Character and Citizenship Education with Leadership Development to Edify Lives in RVPS

SpecialProgrammes.Special Student Development Programmes O: 1. Learning for Life Programme (LLP) - 'RVPS Leadership Development for a VUCA World'   We believe that what students can do with what they know is more important than what they know. Our school mission "To nurture our pupils to be Future-Ready by providing a Total Education in RVPS" gives a strong indication of our endeavour. Our school has put in place a holistic education experience strategic plan which encompasses core academic programme and programmes which are geared towards character, citizenship, life skills and leadership development. We believe that our Total Education will nurture our students to become "Inspiring Learners, Edifying Leaders", and realise the desired outcomes of education.   A key underpin of our LLP is the school's philosophy "Every child can Learn and Lead". Aligned to this belief, we have ensured that a student-centric, values driven education with varied and holistic learning opportunities is provided for all our pupils. Strategic plans and programmes to develop and nurture students in their leadership as well as their active participation in community involvement projects have been created and enhanced over the years.  All these endeavours are undertaken to ensure that all RVians will grow up to be confident individuals, who take initiatives for their learning, and contribute actively as citizens of our country with compassion and integrity. Our LLP's key areas of focus are: a) Values Education through Character Citizen Education (CCE) b) Values in Action (VIA) through Community Involvement c) Leadership Development through Experiential Learning in Camps d) Edifying Leaders through Leadership Development Programmes  2.
